author: khaetlyn
post: Hello. I would like to point out that the words you are quoting me to have said are not my words. In fact, if you look at the blog post to which you are referring, you will notice that I was quoting a biblical website. I provided the link to that site in the blog post. If you care about intellectual honesty, please clarify that I did not say anything about the shroud, I merely quoted another website. Thanks, Khaetlyn Grindell.
title: Did Jesus Eat Fish? Not according to the Shroud of Turin. GoÂ Figure.
